62namespace sockpp {
63
65
70class can_address : public sock_address
71{
73 sockaddr_can addr_{};
74
76 static constexpr size_t SZ = sizeof(sockaddr_can);
77
78public:
80 static constexpr sa_family_t ADDRESS_FAMILY = AF_CAN;
81
83 static const unsigned ALL_IFACE = 0;
84
89 can_address() noexcept {}
95 explicit can_address(unsigned idx) noexcept;
102 can_address(const string& iface);
108 explicit can_address(const sockaddr& addr) noexcept {
109 std::memcpy(&addr_, &addr, sizeof(sockaddr));
110 }
116 can_address(const sock_address& addr) noexcept {
117 std::memcpy(&addr_, addr.sockaddr_ptr(), SZ);
118 }
124 can_address(const sockaddr_can& addr) noexcept : addr_(addr) {}
129 can_address(const can_address& addr) noexcept : addr_(addr.addr_) {}
137 static result<can_address> create(const string& iface);
144 bool is_set() const noexcept override { return addr_.can_family == ADDRESS_FAMILY; }
149 result<string> get_iface() const noexcept;
155 string iface() const noexcept;
160 int index() const noexcept { return addr_.can_ifindex; }
169 socklen_t size() const override { return socklen_t(SZ); }
174 const sockaddr* sockaddr_ptr() const override {
175 return reinterpret_cast<const sockaddr*>(&addr_);
176 }
181 sockaddr* sockaddr_ptr() override { return reinterpret_cast<sockaddr*>(&addr_); }
186 const sockaddr_can* sockaddr_can_ptr() const { return &addr_; }
191 sockaddr_can* sockaddr_can_ptr() noexcept { return &addr_; }
197 string to_string() const noexcept { return string("can:") + iface(); }
198};
199
